item.title: Solidity Functions üõ†Ô∏è
item.description: Solidity functions are the building blocks of smart contracts, allowing you to define the behavior and logic of your decentralized applications. They can be called internally or externally, and their visibility and state permissions can be controlled through modifiers. Understanding how to properly implement functions is crucial for creating efficient and secure smart contracts.
